text: Frank Lloyd (2 February 1886 â€“ 10 August 1960) was a Scottish-American movie director, scriptwriter and producer. Lloyd was among the founders of the Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences, and its president between 1934 and 1935. ==References== Category:1886 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:American movie directors Category:American movie producers Category:American screenwriters
title: Frank Lloyd
